mapper.select: select any_value (date_format( da.createTime,'%Y-%m') ) AS date, any_value ( sum(da.total) ) AS pay, any_value ( sum(da.revenue) ) AS revenue FROM ( SELECT any_value ( sum( ep.pay ) ) AS total, any_value ( 0 ) as revenue, any_value ( ep.create_time ) AS createTime FROM exp_pay ep GROUP BY YEAR ( ep.create_time ), MONTH ( ep.create_time ) UNION ALL SELECT any_value ( 0 ) AS total, any_value ( sum( er.money ) )as revenue, any_value ( er.create_time ) AS createTime FROM exp_revenue er GROUP BY YEAR ( er.create_time ), MONTH ( er.create_time ) ) AS da GROUP BY YEAR ( da.createTime ), MONTH ( da.createTime )

SELECT any_value ('支出') as type, any_value ( sum(ep.pay)) AS money
FROM exp_pay ep where YEAR(ep.create_time)=#{time} UNION all SELECT any_value ( '营收') AS type, any_value ( sum(er.money) )as money FROM exp_revenue er where YEAR(er.create_time)=#{time}

SELECT any_value ( ec.type_name ) AS typeName, any_value ( sum( ep.pay ) ) AS money FROM exp_pay ep RIGHT JOIN exp_pay_revenue_category ec ON ep.prcid = ec.prcid WHERE YEAR ( ep.create_time ) =#{time} GROUP BY ep.prcid

SELECT any_value(year(da.createTime)) as yearTime FROM ( SELECT any_value ( ep.create_time ) AS createTime FROM exp_pay ep GROUP BY YEAR ( ep.create_time ) UNION ALL SELECT any_value ( er.create_time ) AS createTime FROM exp_revenue er GROUP BY YEAR ( er.create_time ) ) da GROUP BY YEAR ( da.createTime ) ORDER BY yearTime asc

SELECT any_value ( MONTH ( da.createTime ) ) AS monthTime FROM ( SELECT any_value ( ep.create_time ) AS createTime FROM exp_pay ep GROUP BY MONTH ( ep.create_time ) UNION ALL SELECT any_value ( er.create_time ) AS createTime FROM exp_revenue er GROUP BY MONTH ( er.create_time ) ) da GROUP BY MONTH ( da.createTime ) ORDER BY monthTime ASC
